backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing access control, user profiles, and contact form submissions with admin-only retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining the warm color palette and light/dark theme CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with five main routes wrapped in the shared SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing current year and portfolio owner’s name.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Responsive navigation header displaying brand name and links with mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper rendering header, main content, and footer across all pages.
frontend/src/content/portfolioIdentity.t: Centralized portfolio identity object storing Vedika Pawar’s personal and professional details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing authenticated or anonymous backend actors with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Hook and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
Provides a React Query mutation hook to submit contact form data using an actor and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and theme variables for light and dark modes with custom color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Implements a contact page with a form, validation, and submission using the contact form mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/Education.tsx: Renders an education page displaying academic history, achievements, and subjects in card-based sections.
frontend/src/pages/Gallery.tsx: Displays a gallery of images with titles and descriptions, including hover effects and a call-to-action card.
frontend/src/pages/HomeAbout.tsx: Shows a homepage about section with a profile intro, bio, and highlights of work scope.
frontend/src/pages/Skills.tsx: Presents categorized technical skills with progress bars and additional professional skill highlights.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project’s state, requirements, features, and goals for building a multi-page portfolio site.
